resources.string:
Why a wallpaper app ? Here's why:

\* There are already a lot of wallpaper apps, but they are optimized to show you the wallpapers only for your phone, i.e. they will only find the wallpapers of the screen resolution of your phone. So to download higher quality wallpapers you'd anyhow need to download from your browser.

\* Most of the wallpaper apps show you the wallpaper which are curated by themselves or using any API. This app parses the a lot of resources to provide you with the highest quality unique wallpapers.

\* There are no ads.
